EmailTemplate.subject: Win a $10,000 Desired State Vacation from VMTurbo @ Booth 505
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmworld-sweeps-2015&utm_content=05202015> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
This Sunday we will be joining friends, colleagues and IT Leaders alike for an unforgettable few days at VMworld 2015. With thousands of attendees, influential thought leaders and fascinating learning sessions, we're sure you'll leave San Francisco with some great takeaways.
The VMTurbo Desired State Giveaway <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmworld-2015-your-desired-state/>
VMTurbo has helped more than 1,000 customers reach their Desired state within their cloud and virtual environments. Now, we want to help our users, and real-time control believers, get to their own personal Desired state. Our grand prize winner will receive $10,000 to anywhere in the world of their choice! There are 5 ways to enter:
- Visiting Booth #505 during VMworld 2015 expo hours and be scanned by a VMTurbo staff member - Participating in the "human vs. machine challenge" at VMworld Booth #505 - Attending our VMworld VIP Cocktail Party at The Drake in downtown San Francisco on Monday, August 31st - Registering yourself or a friend in the Green Circle Community <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome>. All new sign ups through September 2nd will receive an entry - Following and engaging with VMTurbo on social media - tell us about your desired state using #desiredstate:
- Follow and Tweet @VMTurbo <https://twitter.com/VMTurbo> using #desiredstate - Follow us on Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> and post using #desiredstate - Follow us on Instagram <https://instagram.com/vmturbo_inc/> and post using #desiredstate
- Click here <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmworld-2015-your-desired-state/> for more information on the contest
Stop by Booth #505 for Awe Inspiring Presentations (and Swag)
Make sure to stop by and check out presentations from VMTurbo, Pure Storage, Nutanix, Arista and more. We will be giving away a Pebble Time watch at each presentation! Full presentation schedule can be found here <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmworld-2015-your-desired-state/#schedule>.
Join us at The Drake for the Best After Party in Town!
Come unwind with VMTurbo and our partners, Arista, Nutanix & Pure Storage at our 3rd annual VMTurbo VIP Cocktail party! This will be a night to remember, not to mention each attendee will be entered into our Desired State giveaway, grand prize being $10,000 towards your dream vacation and a Turbostack!
<http://vmturbo.com/resources/events/vmturbo-2015-vip-cocktail-party/>
See you at VMworld!
-The VMTurbo Team
